name: PATWAR
briefDescription: Patwar has lot of experience to perform several types of social projects for up gradation of communities from weaker section and lower strata of society of rural & urban areas. Society has got opportunity to run its project in although India especially in North Region. The major factors for the birth of PATWAR is given in Mission and Vision MissionFree Society from Stigma and Discrimination and Say WE ARE THEIR ….. WE WILL BE THERE. As for Patwar, means to support the community (including Women, Men , and Children.);  to cross all the barriers and difficulties faced in day to day life as a Mediator/ Animator. Vision Overall Development of Community to Empowerment and Advocate to know their Rights in Education, Health and Community Development especially focused on Youth, Women and Children’s.

address: 303, R-50, Khieki Extenion, Malviya Nagar,  Other Address Lines ----  City/Town/Village/Taluka New Delhi  State Delhi  District South Delhi  Pin 110017
